comments.body: Conversion functions  generally call the `autoConvert` function and then fixup the interesting places.  In this cases it must be totally manual because of `spec`.  Can we leave a comment at the top of these functions about why?
Why do we need it to be non-nil when converted?
Just the way the auto-generated conversion function is written, it needs a non-nil object to update. Note that we only do this if the input overhead is non-nil.
